column4: guys, i'd like to know about VNC and how it works; i've been trying to connect via VNC to my brother's computer for an hour, give or take, and it still isn't working, despite the fact that i've tried every answer i've looked up
oh, was just about to mention that
and i'm using the remote thingy on here
yes, to my knowledge, windows does not support the rdp protocol
did you install vncserver on the other machine?(assuming you're trying to view his desktop)
you also need to install vnc on your machine...
go to application/internet/terminal service client... where it says "protocol" is is VNC available?
thats why, ubuntu windows needs VNC..(at least XP does.. i'm assuming vista does also)
